column4: If I create a file in a symlink'ed folder, does that file get created in the target folder only?
It should be created at the origin of the symlink.
Such as.. if you symlink toast/ to bagel/ , change into bagel/ , create butter.txt, It will appear in both toast/ and bagel/
Deleting bagel/ in the above will not affect toast/ in any way. On the other hand.. deleting toast/ would break bagel/
